title: OS X Power PC RE tool (debugger/disassembler)
content: So I want to know is such tool exist without counting IDA PRO. And is there any GUI version of it if exist - because I really don't want to debugging with terminal. My OS X version is Snow Leopard. I want to disassemble and debug an PowerPC app which runs with Rosetta on OS X 10.6.

answers_data.content:
Haven't tried it myself but I've heard about otx (object tool extended):

http://otx.osxninja.com/

comments.text: Thank you but I have already seen this tool and I don't find it useful because it isn't have a debugger.
You need to be more specific then, your question doesn't state that the tool has to have a debugger.
